source: Reward for inviting Cyno to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is $[A1404], equip this card.
After $[A1404] equips this card, immediately use $[S14042] once.
When your $[A1404], who has this card equipped, uses $[S14042] with 3 or 5 levels of Pactsworn Pathclearer's Indwelling effect, deal +1 additional DMG.
(You must have $[A1404] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
